mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alq_consultation c where c.status =2 and c.is_delete =0 and c.id = #{id}

SELECT acsss.title,acsss.comment_num,acsss.detail_summary,aca.address FROM alq_consultation acsss LEFT JOIN alq_consultation_attachment aca on acsss.id = aca.consultation_id where cover=1 and acsss.id =#{id} and status =2 AND is_delete =0 OR null
select address,detail_content as detailContent,type from alq_consultation_attachment where consultation_id = #{id} AND cover is NULL ORDER BY sort_num ASC

select m.nickname, acc.created_time AS createdTime, acc.id as commentid,aam.address useraddress,m.user_type as userType, aat.address,acc.fabulous_num as reply_num,acc.content,acc.reply_num as reply from alq_consultation a LEFT JOIN alq_consultation_comment acc ON a.id = acc.consultation_id LEFT JOIN alq_member m ON acc.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN alq_attachment aat ON m.logo_attachment_id =aat.id left join alq_attachment aam on m.logo_attachment_id = aam.id WHERE a.id =#{consultaionId} and acc.comment_info_id is NULL ORDER BY acc.created_time desc LIMIT 0,4

select aaa.content, amm.nickname, aaa.created_time AS createdTime, aaa.reply_num as replyNum, aaa.fabulous_num as fabulousNum, aat.address from alq_consultation_comment aaa LEFT JOIN alq_member amm ON aaa.member_id = amm.id LEFT JOIN alq_attachment aat on amm.logo_attachment_id = aat.id where aaa.comment_info_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY aaa.created_time asc limit 0,2
SELECT comment_num as countnum FROM alq_consultation where id = #{id}
select c.id,c.created_time as createdTime FROM alq_consultation c where c.consulatation_id =#{id} ORDER BY c.created_time DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT detail_content AS detailContent,address from alq_consultation_attachment where consultation_id = #{id} AND sort_num is not null ORDER BY sort_num asc

SELECT DISTINCT aca.created_time as createdTime,am.nickname,aat.address as useraddress ,aca.consultation_id as id,am.user_type as userType from alq_consultation_attachment aca LEFT JOIN alq_consultation ac ON ac.id = aca.consultation_id LEFT JOIN alq_member am ON am.id = ac.member_id LEFT JOIN alq_attachment aat ON am.logo_attachment_id =aat.id where aca.consultation_id = #{id}

select aca.created_time as createdTime,aca.address,aca.detail_content as detailsss,aca.consultation_id as id from alq_consultation_attachment aca LEFT JOIN alq_consultation ac ON ac.id = aca.consultation_id LEFT JOIN alq_member am ON am.id = ac.member_id LEFT JOIN alq_attachment aat ON am.logo_attachment_id =aat.id where aca.consultation_id = #{id} AND (aca.cover = 1 OR aca.sort_num = 0) ORDER BY aca.sort_num desc LIMIT 0,4
